description: This file contains test cases for the GameScreen React component, utilizing React Native testing library and jest to mock hooks and simulate user interactions.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up mocks for hooks before each test.

methods.name: afterEach
methods.description: Clears all mocks after each test.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines a test case to verify rendering and navigation behavior of GameScreen.
